article.title: Boeing Awarded Space-Based Surveillance Funds
article.text: The Boeing Co., El Segundo, California, has been awarded a $23,477,634 modification P00015 to previously awarded contract FA8819-15-C-0007 for Space Based Space Surveillance Block 10 sustainment. Contractor will provide sustainment and required development for Air Force operations and maintenance of the Space Based Space Surveillance System and Red Local Area Network. Work will be performed at El Segundo, California; and Colorado Springs, Colorado, and is expected to be complete by June 20, 2022. This award is the result of a sole-source acquisition. Fiscal 2017 operations and maintenance funds in the amount of $11,000,000 are being obligated at the time of award. The Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, California, is the contracting activity.
